content: {"name": "Agatha House Foundation", "alternate_name": "", "description": "There may be a week when we don\u2019t open but it would be posted on the location gate and on the **[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/agathahousefoundation/)**.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/agathahousefoundation/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4471 Mundy Lane", "address_2": "", "city": "East Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10466", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9025842, "longitude": -73.84114819999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(646) 335-2334", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "23:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Check their social media for updates"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Delivery may be available"}]}
